tool.name: SAGA.imagery_classification.4
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPES False isArrayFEATURES False isArrayTRAINING False isArrayFILE_LOAD False isArrayFILE_SAVE False output_data_CLASSES $output_data_CLASSES name SAGA.imagery_classification.4 SHAPES $SHAPES FEATURES $FEATURES NORMALISE $NORMALISE TRAINING $TRAINING FILE_LOAD $FILE_LOAD FILE_SAVE $FILE_SAVE METHOD $METHOD THRESHOLD_DIST $THRESHOLD_DIST THRESHOLD_ANGLE $THRESHOLD_ANGLE THRESHOLD_PROB $THRESHOLD_PROB RELATIVE_PROB $RELATIVE_PROB WTA_0 $WTA_0 WTA_1 $WTA_1 WTA_2 $WTA_2 WTA_3 $WTA_3 WTA_4 $WTA_4 WTA_5 $WTA_5 prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.outputType_CLASSES transmissionMode_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.transmissionMode_CLASSES

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: FEATURES
param.label: Features
param.help: Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TRAINING
param.label: Training Classes
param.help: Training Classes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FILE_LOAD
param.label: Load Statistics from File...
param.help: Load Statistics from File... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: FILE_SAVE
param.label: Save Statistics to File...
param.help: Save Statistics to File... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: THRESHOLD_DIST
param.label: Distance Threshold
param.help: Let pixel stay unclassified, if minimum euclidian or mahalanobis distance is greater than threshold.

param.name: THRESHOLD_ANGLE
param.label: Spectral Angle Threshold (Degree)
param.help: Let pixel stay unclassified, if spectral angle distance is greater than threshold.

param.name: THRESHOLD_PROB
param.label: Probability Threshold
param.help: Let pixel stay unclassified, if maximum likelihood probability value is less than threshold.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CLASSES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Supervised classification for attribute data. To train the classifier choose an attribute that provides class identifiers for those records, for which the target class is known, and no data for all other records.
